body:
Java Project questions help you to evaluate a candidate's ability to code and test a multi-file Java software project. The candidate is asked to write both code and unit tests, which they can run right in the browser. We utilize the popular Maven and JUnit frameworks so you can be confident in a candidate’s knowledge of the Java ecosystem. We give you the flexibility to decide on the code you want to provide to the candidates up front. Testing is an important part of the software development process, and Java Project questions allow candidates to show you how well they understand that.

Refer the following topics for more information:

  1. Creating a Java Project Question
  2. Scoring a Java Project Question
title: Java Project
